content.p: There are a number of different roles which fall into this category: Associate Accounts will be created and retained with the following conditions:- Please note that only designated sponsors can access the form to request for Associate Accounts. If you would like to apply an associate account on behalf of someone who fits the description of an associate, kindly approach your Head of Department/School or Faculty Manager. telephone: +603 8924 8199 fax: +603 8924 8007 email: itservicedesk@nottingham.edu.my
